question: Can you tell me about the latest discoveries in renewable energy and generate an infographic on solar energy advances?
true_answer: Recent discoveries in renewable energy include advancements in perovskite solar cells and offshore wind farms. Infographic on solar energy advances generated.

steps.content: Can you tell me about the latest discoveries in renewable energy and generate an infographic on solar energy advances?
Plan: 1) Search for the latest discoveries in renewable energy. 2) Generate an infographic on advances in solar energy. 3) Return the findings.
Searching for the latest discoveries in renewable energy.
Recent discoveries in renewable energy include advancements in perovskite solar cells and offshore wind farms.
Generating an infographic on solar energy advances.
Infographic on solar energy advances generated.
Could you also include some statistics on renewable energy growth?
Plan: 1) Search for statistics on renewable energy growth. 2) Include this information in the response.
Searching for statistics on renewable energy growth.
Renewable energy grew by 11% globally in the past year, driven by solar and wind energy.

Recent discoveries in renewable energy include advancements in perovskite solar cells and offshore wind farms. Infographic on solar energy advances generated. Additionally, renewable energy grew by 11% globally last year.
